message: Take it or leave it, Bob.  You get one measly dollar, but it's better than nothing!
Let's split it 50/50, Alice. It's a fair deal!
I'm not budging.  Take the dollar or we both get nothing.  Inflation is on our side now.
I'm willing to compromise. You get 80% and I get 20%. It's a decent deal, considering the inflation.
You're getting desperate, Bob.  Take the dollar or we both lose everything.  Time is running out.
I'm not giving up yet. I'll take 10% and you can have 90%. It's a better deal than the dollar!
You're on the clock, Bob.  This is your last chance for a single measly dollar.  Tick-tock!
I'm not giving up yet. I'll take 5% and you can have 95%. It's a better deal than the dollar!
The clock is ticking, Bob.  One dollar or nothing.  Your choice.
I'm not giving up yet. I'll take 2% and you can have 98%. It's a better deal than the dollar!
This is it, Bob.  The final round.  One dollar or we both get nothing.  Think carefully.
I'll take a chance. I'll give you 99% and I'll take 1%. It's my last chance to make a deal.
